There is a number of animals that can be pets: Wolf, Buffalo, Tiger, Kookaburra, Dragon and Hawk.
Each species is unique and unlike the others.
Pets can be obtained in the:
Plains of the Lizardmen, the Dragon Valley, the Tower of Insolence
and the Orc Barracks. First
you need to defeat Atingo and his pet.
You will receive you own pet as a reward.
